isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - REMOVE - AUXILIARY SECTION

svcsubproc.title: REAR AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR AND YOKE

step1.para: Cut the lockwire on the splitter yoke retaining bolt ( Figure 36) and loosen the bolt ( inset, Figure 36).

figure.caption: Figure 36. Cut Lockwire on Splitter Yoke Retaining Bolt and Loosen Bolt

step1.para: Remove the retaining bolt, splitter yoke and sliding clutch assembly from the auxiliary section ( Figure 37).

figure.caption: Figure 37. Remove Retaining Bolt, Splitter Yoke and Sliding Clutch Assembly From Auxiliary Section

step1.para: Temporarily install an output yoke on the output shaft and secure it by placing a bar through the yoke ( Figure 38).

figure.caption: Figure 38. Temporarily Install Output Yoke on Output Shaft and Secure by Placing Bar Through Yoke

step1.para: Break loose the 15/16 inch retaining bolt on the front of the output shaft ( Figure 39).

figure.caption: Figure 39. Break Loose Retaining Bolt on Front of Output Shaft

step1.para: Secure the auxiliary housing in a vise ( left, Figure 40). Remove the auxiliary countershaft retaining straps or rear bearing covers, shim and rear bearing race ( right, Figure 40).

figure.caption: Figure 40. Secure Auxiliary Housing in Vise and Remove Auxiliary Countershaft Retaining Straps or Rear Bearing Covers, Shim and Rear Bearing Race

caution.para: The countershaft will fall loose in the auxiliary section.

step1.para: Use a soft bar and maul to partially drive the output shaft forward ( Figure 41).

figure.caption: Figure 41. Partially Drive Output Shaft Forward

step1.para: Remove the auxiliary countershafts from the auxiliary section case ( Figure 42).

figure.caption: Figure 42. Remove Auxiliary Countershafts From Auxiliary Section Case

step1.para: If necessary, secure the countershaft assemblies in a vise and remove both the front and rear bearings with a bearing separator and jaw pullers ( Figure 43).

figure.caption: Figure 43. Remove Front and Rear Bearings

svcsubproc.title: REAR AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLY
svcsubproc.para: Remove the 15/16 inch retaining bolt, retainer and auxiliary drive gear from the auxiliary section ( Figure 44).

figure.caption: Figure 44. Remove Retaining Bolt, Retainer and Auxiliary Drive Gear From Auxiliary Section

step1.para: Remove the bolts, range cylinder cover and gasket ( Figure 45).

figure.caption: Figure 45. Remove Bolts, Range Cylinder Cover and Gasket

step1.para: Remove the nut from the yoke bar ( Figure 46).

figure.caption: Figure 46. Remove Nut From Yoke Bar

step1.para: Cut the lockwire ( Figure 47). Remove the two 3/4 inch yoke lockscrews ( inset, Figure 47).

figure.caption: Figure 47. Cut Lockwire and Remove Yoke Lockscrews

step1.para: Pull the yoke bar from the cylinder housing bore ( Figure 48).

figure.caption: Figure 48. Pull Yoke Bar From Cylinder Housing Bore

step1.para: Remove the shift yoke and synchronizer assembly from the output shaft ( Figure 49).

figure.caption: Figure 49. Remove Shift Yoke and Synchronizer Assembly From Output Shaft

svcsubproc.title: Output Shaft and Rear Bearing Assemblies
svcsubproc.para: Use a soft bar and maul to drive the output shaft forward and through the rear bearing assembly ( Figure 50).

figure.caption: Figure 50. Drive Output Shaft Forward and Through Rear Bearing Assembly

svcsubproc.title: Splitter Cover
svcsubproc.para: Remove the bolts from the splitter cylinder cover ( Figure 51) and remove the splitter cylinder cover and gasket from the auxiliary section case ( inset, Figure 51).

figure.caption: Figure 51. Remove Bolts From Splitter Cylinder Cover and Remove Cover
